y are

lms for nearly 
"3  years or less," and the people staying here, are stuck =
until the  full 
return of Jesus.  There will be war, the ac, amount other =

with here, so be ready within so you won't be left here.  =
Hint it  will not be 
a space ship or anything like that, those going over =
will  simply disappear 
to those still here, it will "be  instantaneous, an=
d it will not hurt."  sf
